for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n = int(raw_input())
    d = {}
    ctr = 0
    for j in xrange(n):
        name, vote = raw_input().split()
        try:
            if d[name] == "+":
                ctr -= 1
            else:
                ctr += 1
            if vote == "+":
                ctr += 1
            else:
                ctr -= 1
            d[name] = vote
        except:
            d[name] = vote
            if vote == "+":
                ctr += 1
            else:
                ctr -= 1
    print ctr
